description:
Please note before you register for this course:

Unfortunately we can no longer provide free hosting accounts as mentioned in this course. If you register to this course to make use of the free hosting account, please do not continue as this service is no longer available.

In this course you will learn everything you would need to know on how to create your very own Joomla 2.5 website with out the need of coding anything.

You donâ€™t need any coding experience or previous Joomla experience. Once you have completed this course you will be ready to start designing your own Joomla 2.5 websites from scratch!

In this course we will be creating a complete basic Joomla 2.5 website with some modules so you can lean step by step as we go along.

Once you have completed the course, you will get an certificate of completion.

Also included in the course you will get 5 Joomla 2.5 / 3.0 templates that you may use to practice, create a website for yourself, friends or even for your first clients.

Lets get started!
title: Learn Joomla 2.5 from scratch
